definition: lit. settling accounts after the autumn harvest (idiom); to wait until the time is ripe to settle accounts/to bide time for revenge
lit. to kill a chicken in front of a monkey; fig. to make an example of sb (by punishment) to frighten others
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. to kill the donkey when the grinding is done (idiom)/to get rid of sb once he has ceased to be useful
lit. kill one to warn a hundred (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
to retaliate
to make reprisals/to retaliate/revenge/retaliation
to use the current topic to put over one's own ideas/to use sth as a pretext to make a fuss
undisclosed account/to settle matters later/to blame sb after the event
to be made a scapegoat/to be unjustly blamed
(of a plot etc) to be exposed (idiom)/to come to light
to throw stones at sb who fell down a well (idiom); to hit a person who is down
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
strike first and gain the upper hand (idiom, martial arts term); Making the first move is an advantage.
lit. to nurture a tiger invites calamity/fig. to indulge one's enemy is asking for trouble (idiom)
to use public office to avenge private wrongs
